title: What is the Theme application?
info: The "Theme" application offers a collection of over 12,000 free themes and 15,000 high-quality wallpapers designed for Android smartphones. It allows users to personalize their devices, making them more visually appealing and tailored to individual tastes.

title: How can I use it?
info: Using the "Themes" application is simple and user-friendly. You can browse, select, and apply themes or wallpapers directly from the app to customize your device. For detailed instructions, please follow this link: [https://thethemes.co/use_app].

title: How to apply themes or wallpapers?
info:
To apply themes or wallpapers, follow these steps:
1.Open the "Theme" application and navigate to the Themes or Wallpapers tab.
2.Browse and select the theme or wallpaper you like.
3.Scroll up to find the "Download/Apply" button.
4.Tap the button to download and apply your chosen theme or wallpaper.

title: What is Lite Theme?
info: Lite Theme are lightweight themes designed to save system resources, ensuring smooth performance. They are compatible with all smartphones, making them an ideal choice for users who prefer simple and efficient customization.

title: I can't download themes because it says "No internet connection." What should I do?
info: This problem occurs on POCO, Xiaomi and Redmi devices when the selected theme is not available in your region or not compatible with your device, please try to select other themes. This problem does not depend on us. Thank you for your understanding!

title: I applied a theme, but my device icons didn't change. What should I do?
info: This issue occurs when you apply a Lite Theme. Lite Themes are lightweight themes designed to save system resources and do not include icon changes. To change your device icons, try applying a different theme.

title: Will it support to my device?
info: The application supports most themes for Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi, Redmi, Oppo, POCO, and Realme devices. However, users with other devices can still enjoy Lite Themes and all high-quality wallpapers available in the app.

title: I can't apply themes or fonts on my Realme device. What should I do?
info: Before applying themes or fonts, ensure that your smartphone has the official Theme Store (or theme services) installed. If not, try installing the official Theme Store for your device, if possible. Also, pay close attention to the information provided under the theme or font screenshots, as missing requirements may prevent you from opening or applying them.

title: I looked for fonts, but there are no fonts available. What should I do?
info: Currently, fonts in the application are available only for Oppo and Realme devices. We are actively working on adding support for fonts on other devices in the future. Thank you for your patience!

title: What is the benefit of using this application if Themes already includes a theme store?
info: Our application is designed to provide you with over 12,000 free, high-quality themes and wallpapers, saving you the hassle of searching for free options in the Theme Store. We focus on making personalization easy and accessible for everyone. Thank you for your understanding!

title: I applied a theme or font. How can I return to the default settings?
info:
To return to the default theme or font on your device, follow these general steps:
1. Open the "Themes" or "Display" application on your device.
2. Go to the "My Themes" or "My Fonts" section (this may vary depending on your device).
3. Look for an option labeled "Default", "System Default" or something similar.
4. Select the default option and tap "Apply" to restore the original settings.
If you don't see these options, check your device's settings under "Display", "Personalization" or "Themes" for the default settings.

title: Why is the font not changing on Realme and Oppo devices?
info: This issue may occur due to your device's performance limitations or because the font is not compatible with your device. We recommend trying another font to resolve the problem. Thank you for your understanding!

title: Can I use without Ads?
info: We understand your concern about ads. You can remove them for free by going to the "My Downloads" section and selecting the "Remove Ads" option. This will allow you to continue using the app without interruptions. Thank you for your understanding!
